title: Establishes regional boards of governors throughout New York state to review certain practices and procedures affecting the funeral directing industry
summary: Establishes regional boards of governors throughout New York state to review certain practices and procedures affecting the funeral directing industry; provides that the commissioner of health shall appoint the members to each such board.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing regional boards to oversee certain aspects of the funeral directing industry
